name: qboot
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Tool for computing q-ball ODFs using bootstrap samples

inputs.description: Data file
inputs.name: Data file

inputs.description: Mask file
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: b vectors file
inputs.name: b vectors file

inputs.description: b values file
inputs.name: b values file

inputs.description: Output directory (default is logdir)
inputs.name: Output log directory

inputs.description: Use the actual directory name given - i.e. don't add + to make a new directory
inputs.name: Force directory flag

inputs.description: File provided with multi-shell data. Indicates the number of directions for each shell
inputs.name: Multi-shell data file

inputs.description: Which model to use. 1=Tuch's ODFs, 2=CSA ODFs (default), 3=multi-shell CSA ODFs
inputs.name: Model type

inputs.description: Maximum spherical harmonic order employed (must be even, default=4)
inputs.name: Lmax order

inputs.description: Maximum number of ODF peaks to be detected (default 2)
inputs.name: Number of peaks

inputs.description: Minimum threshold for a local maxima to be considered an ODF peak. Expressed as a fraction of the maximum ODF value (default 0.4)
inputs.name: Threshold value

inputs.description: Number of bootstrap samples (default is 50)
inputs.name: Number of samples

inputs.description: Laplace-Beltrami regularization parameter (default is 0)
inputs.name: Laplace-Beltrami regularization parameter

inputs.description: Signal attenuation regularization parameter for models=2,3 (default is 0.01)
inputs.name: Signal attenuation parameter

inputs.description: Laplacian sharpening parameter for model=1 (default is 0, should be smaller than 1)
inputs.name: Laplacian sharpening parameter

inputs.description: Seed for pseudo-random number generator
inputs.name: Seed value

inputs.description: Compute a generalised FA, using the mean ODF in each voxel
inputs.name: Generalized FA flag

inputs.description: Save the ODF coefficients instead of the peaks. WARNING: These can be huge files, please use a few bootstrap samples and a low lmax!
inputs.name: Save coefficients flag

inputs.description: Save the mean ODF coefficients across all samples
inputs.name: Save mean coefficients flag

inputs.description: Switch on diagnostic messages
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Display this help message
inputs.name: Help flag

groups.description: Optional parameters for configuring the qboot tool
groups.name: Optional Parameters

output-files.description: Output files saved in the specified log directory
output-files.name: Output Files
